title: Stuffed Chicken Cordon Bleu with Prosciutto

Ingredients.2: 2 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves

Ingredients.6: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.8: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Coat a 7x11-inch baking dish with cooking spray.

Directions.2: Place chicken on a cutting board. Holding a sharp knife horizontal to the board, cut a 3-inch deep pocket lengthwise in the thick side of each breast. Place a slice of Swiss cheese and two slices of prosciutto in the pocket of each chicken breast. Place in the prepared baking dish and sprinkle chicken evenly with breadcrumbs, salt, and pepper. Place 1/2 tablespoon of butter on top of each chicken breast.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, 30 to 35 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).

Directions.4: While chicken bakes, prepare sauce by mixing soup, sour cream, and lemon juice together in a pot. Heat over medium heat until sauce thins a bit. Add water, 1 tablespoon at a time, to thin sauce to desired consistency (should be slightly runny to pour over chicken).

Directions.5: Top chicken with sauce and serve.
